My son ended up having to do Summer school, and they all got to work in the school greenhouses. He loved it. He actually enjoyed going to school.

As a nutrition educator for a non profit in Santa Fe , New Mexico, Cooking with Kids , this story makes my heart sing. Also, as a gardener, we don‚Äôt realize how many kids get excited about learning where food comes from. It‚Äôs like magic making. Once we grow the food, my role as a nutrition educator is to gather the kiddos in the classroom kitchen, learn how to read a recipe, teach cooking techniques, equipment etc, real hands on learning with peers where we eat together around the table and trying nutritious foods from many cultures. We never force to eat but maybe try..the kids support each other. Changing lives one child at a time‚Ä¶ü•∞
